title: Engineered Gadolinium-Decorated Magnetic Resonance Nanoprobes for Enhanced Liver Fibrosis Theranostics.
abstract: Liver fibrosis has the potential to advance to irreversible cirrhosis or hepatocellular carcinoma, rendering early diagnosis and intervention of utmost importance.
